thread.title: London from the Monument's secret viewing platform
thread.title_full: London from the Monument's secret viewing platform

author: Oliver Smith
title: London from the Monument's secret viewing platform
text:
London London from the Monument's secret viewing platform A pair of Londoners gained access to the fiery urn atop the Monument to take some remarkable selfies Comments 
The view of London from the public viewing platform at the top of the Monument is impressive. It's that little bit better if you can gain access to the very top of the column to spy the capital through its gilded flames. 
To capture images for a new Baizdon guidebook, the photographer Adam Parker was given access to a secret staircase that leads to the pinnacle of the 62-metre attraction. 
Naturally, once up there, he couldn't resist the urge to take a selfie or two. 
The guidebook's writer, Tee Dobinson, followed suit.
